nodes.text: The door has a chess piece and some cards carved upon it. This must lead to the Recreation Room.
Hmmm... this looks like a L-Bow class lock. That means it doesn't quite need a Houdini 42, but it takes some real skill in Tool Use.
Okay. There's a lock. It's complex. But I'm just can't quite tell what sort of lock it is right now.
I think I can hear Senore Sosi saying something to other people...
I don't hear anything being smashed or destroyed, so I guess that's a good thing.
I can hear several people speaking... something about games...
Katie is saying something about Poobah...
I think I hear Esme saying something about her test...
I can hear Sosi saying about something about the Thief - and Sosi sounds angry. Maybe the thief stole something from Sosi... Good!
I think I hear Esme's voice from the far side of the room, but I can't make out the words. Sosi and Kyro are talking about billiards...
I can hear Thomas saying something about Poobah...
Katie's saying something about the sea caves... Sosi is grumbling to Kyro about the midterm.
I can hear Sosi's voice - and boy, is he mad!
Katie and Esme are talking about the Sea Caves... they sound like they are over by the fireplace. Oh, and it sounds like Aeolus is playing his pipes in there.
I hear Kyro saying something about the Catacombs... and Sosi sneering at it.
I can hear Aeolus playing some cheery Nights of the Dead tune, and Katie and Esme chatting over by the fireplace.
I can hear Esme and Katie are talking... and the subject is clearly about Drats.
Aeolus is singing so loudly I can't hear anyone else.
Katie and Esme are talking about tests...
Sounds like people are discussing Poobah...
Doesn't sound like anyone is talking in there right now.
Doesn't sound like anything's going on in the Rec Room right now.
The door is locked.
Now I can slyly slip into this Rec Room.
